article_title: U.S. Rep. Michael Grimm Draws on Loyalty and Stays Competitive in Race
article_text:
Kneeling before a memorial for his son recently, Robert Ollis said he was joined by a surprise visitor: U.S. Rep. Michael Grimm.

Mr. Grimm, a Staten Island Republican, spoke with Mr. Ollis about his 24-year-old son, Staff Sgt. Michael Ollis, who died serving in Afghanistan in August 2013. Mr. Ollis said the congressman had become close with the family since the death, helping erect the memorial and praying with the couple at their...

twitter.description: Rep. Michael Grimm’s work for constituents has yielded a loyalty on Staten Island that helps explain his ability to stay competitive in his bid for a third term despite a federal indictment.
twitter.creator: @MaraGay

image.alt: U.S. Rep. Michael Grimm draws on loyalty and stays competitive in race, despite indictment

twitter.title: Grimm Draws on Loyalty and Stays Competitive in Race
